page.title: 15Family Life
page.content: I am called Emma Louise Heesom and I live in St. Austell, Cornwall. My house is white with a big front garden and a big back garden. There are four people in my family. I have one sister called Nicola Jane Heesom. My mum is called Maureen and my dad is called Eric. My dad is the manager of Polkyth Recreation Centre in St.Austell and my mum works at the Cottage Hospital in St. Austell. I play made up games and I like playing games on the Computer. I also play board games. My hobbies are "pesting" my sister and collecting post cards. We go all over Cornwall for trips. We go to Warrington to visit my relatives. I have a grandma and two grandads. (Emma Heesom)
